prompt: that the arbiter grant signal is 0-1-hot
that the arbiter holds requests until valid
that whether starvation occurs, i.e. check that each request from client is eventually granted
that if there is a req, there will be a grant except when busy.
that each grant must be to a requesting client only
that no grants are made when the arbiter downstream is busy
that the arbiter holds onto grants when there is hold
that the given arbiter follows the Round Robin policy: start with 0th client and keep granting from 0 to n clients one by one except those that are not requesting, then wrap around.
that the first grant of the arbiter follows the Round Robin policy: start with 0th client and keep granting from 0 to n clients one by one except those that are not requesting, then wrap around.
that the arbiter is never on hold or busy or on continued grant at the same time
that each grant id is proper
that each grant id is proper, for the case where there no grants yet
